title: Did Obama’s Last 3 Years See More Jobs Created Than Trump’s First 3?
subtitle: Left-leaning critics of U.S. President Donald Trump rejected his claims to overseeing unprecedented economic growth in early 2020. Who was right?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: During the final three years of Barack Obama's presidency, the number of jobs added was 1.5 million greater than the number added during President Donald Trump's first three years in office.
